sections.title: Self Directed Investments
paragraphs: In addition to ADCB Asset Management's in-house managed funds, our open architecture platform provides access to global mutual funds, international equities and ETF's, bonds, private equity, hedge funds and structured products.

Our market execution partners span most developed and emerging markets, covering equities, bonds, preferreds, perpetuals, ETF's, REITS, warrants, futures, options, as well as the ability to participate in IPOs. Custody is arranged through a global network of custody partners.
